website_summaries.verdict: Take your indoor gardening to the next level with this LED hydroponics system that can grow up to 9 different plants at once.
pros: Combines a 30W LED light with a hydroponics growing system
An LCD screen provides tips, tells you when to add water and nutrients, and when to turn the light on and off
cons: Considerably more expensive than other options

customer_reviews.title: Light quit working by second garden - no response from customer service
customer_reviews.text: Loved my AeroGarden which I received 12/28/2019, I grew a first herb garden and loved it so much I ordered all kinds of seeds and pods so I could keep a continuous Garden. Plants transfer well from AeroGarden to pots. However on my second garden the light went out, support is not available by phone and has not responded to my email requests. So while I love the Garden when working, I now have well over $400 invested in one successful herb garden with no communication from the manufacturer to resolve the issue. In reading other one star reviews I now see customer service for faulty product is an ongoing issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who can’t keep plants alive!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using my aero garden and all of my herbs have sprouted already! It was very easy to setup and program an you can fit it to lift up on your schedule which I love. The water filtering noise is also very calming before bed. I put in 4 herbs so far but I hope to be able to do some veggies and greens this winter. Perfect for someone without a green thumb!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris DeCleene

customer_reviews.title: Great garden when it works
customer_reviews.text: Our herbs are growing like crazy but the clock on the base has malfunctioned and changes time sometimes weekly, sometimes daily. This affects the pump cycles, light cycles and feed/days planted counter. This is unacceptable for a herb garden costing >$200. I’ve reached out to Aerogarden customer service with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and incredibly easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 2019 AeroGarden Bounty and couldn't be more happy with how it looks and how incredibly easy it was to set up. When I ordered the garden I didn't think about ordering pods and was surprised and grateful that the garden came with both pods and fertilizer. My gourmet herbs are already "planted" and being bathed in light! I also downloaded the AeroGarden Wi Fi app and added my garden in minutes. Thank you AeroGrow!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It lasted for 30 seconds after turning it on. Then the screen went blank and now it’s dead. I guess I should be thankful that it failed right away and not after the return window.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk, touch pad fails on $300 item 2 days after warranty ends and company refuses help.
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. Buy a grow lamp and bottle of plant food.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Ray Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Plain brown box, unattractive /unappealing packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product arrive in plain brown box , it appeared to be reconditioned or otherwise reselling a previously returned item not in original packaging. Not attractive presentation. The gift did not make attractive presentation . For this price it was very disappointing as a gift .
customer_reviews.author: ArtF

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: My garden stopped working The pump does not work other featured don't work The light goes on and off all hours of the day and night The indications for water level don't work The call for help to the company is ignored. It is only a few months old, and it is a total loss This is an expensive item. I could not be more disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: To say I'm disappointed after spending hundreds of dollars is an understatement.
customer_reviews.text: It's clear that this box has been opened before. All of the informational and instructional papers are either ripped or crumbled up inside of the box. Additionally, the LED lamp post, which is supposed to slide into the base, does not fit into the base at all! Looking at pictures in other reviews it's clear that the incorrect lamp post was in this box. To say I'm disappointed after spending hundreds of dollars is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: A J Weis

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to our kitchen garden.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my 2-year-old granddaughter who loves salad. It was quite easy to set up and our tomatoes, lettuce and herbs are planted. As an experienced gardener of many years, it is doing just what I expect in the first few days. It was easy to connect to WiFi, download the app and set the program timer. Instructions are included and easy to follow. The only disappointment was that I ordered a white unit and received a black one. However, we like the unit well enough to keep it. Once the plants are bigger, we won’t be looking at the color of the base unit anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gorman

customer_reviews.title: WiFi Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Wifi will not connect after following setup instructions. So I go to website to look for help, but oh, you need your model number from under the base. So now you have to lift a TANK OF WATER to try and find the model number before you can get help. All of this information needs to be printed in a card inside your box, or on the FRONT! And no, there is nothing wrong with my network. All 18 of my other household devices are working properly. Just going to install this AeroGarden in the trash. Its not even worth the hassle of returning or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out for their Privacy Policy!
customer_reviews.text: Don't get the App unless you are comfortable with them selling ALL of your information. Their Privacy Policy is awful! You'll need the App if you want your AeroGarden to alert you when the water is low, or it needs more nutrients. I deleted the App and will just LOOK at the display for this information. I have owned it for less than 24 hours. It was super easy to set-up and the light is absolutely GORGEOUS in my kitchen! Will update if/when something grows in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Screwy touch screen...
customer_reviews.text: I have two other aero gardens and decided to pick up this newer bounty model. It arrived today and during setup the screen just kept flashing back and forth like it was possessed. And this was after I had already gone through the quick plant steps... Add water, nutrients, pods then domes. Wouldn't let me touch to change settings or just go to the home screen. It also makes a high pitch buzzing noise. I'm returning it hoping the replacement is better. Personally I think the old bounty with the bigger screen is better!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service! I purchased this item and the grow lights never worked. After multiple emails they still have not resolved the issue. I kept receiving the message that they were busy processing new orders! I guess my product’s failure wasn’t as important.
customer_reviews.author: C Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start an herb garden!
customer_reviews.text: As a condo dweller that works from home, this thing has been literal breath of fresh air. My water is pretty hard so I had some early challenges, but after switching to distilled, everything is growing perfectly. Seed germination has been hit or miss, but customer support sent out replacements quickly. Cleaning the tub was super easy. My only problem is trying to figure out how many more I'm going to get, and how I'm going to transfer some of the larger plants to planters.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Just what every one needs!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I couldn't figure out why it was so expensive (to me anyway) until I realized how much work it is to keep a hydroponic garden growing ... with the AeroGarden, all the work is done for you. It's quick and easy to set up, takes minutes, literally, to get it going. We're looking forward to growing salad and herbs, especially during this time when we can't all go to the store and we're stuck at home. Fresh will be a real treat. Every one in my family owns one.
customer_reviews.author: TheAssemblagist

customer_reviews.title: Areogarden Bounty is defective!
customer_reviews.text: We received this one as a replacement for a broken one. This is worse than the first one. The lights are only intermittent. Estimated light is less than an hour per day. I'm a big fan of aerogarden, but the "Bounty" does not work! After two of these, I'm warning people to stay away from this model. I'm stuck with it since I can't return the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Del and Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I suggest reading all of the instructions but this thing works like a charm. I’m growing Thai Basil and as you cam see, they are flourishing. There are two things that I think will help you get the best out of this machine. 1. Use distilled water 2. Empty out the water and replace with fresh water once per month (every other feeding). These two critical steps weren’t immediately obvious when I first set up this system, but they are contained in the instructions. I do recommend this system for would-be house farmers. I couldn’t find Thai Basil consistently in markets, so God willing I started growing my own.
customer_reviews.author: anonman

customer_reviews.title: This is Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I sent the one back that didn’t work and after a little hassle with Amazon I got a new one. This one works awesome!! I really wanted to love this. I can’t even get it setup the screen is acting up. It won’t let me push the buttons or when it does the screen just changes to what it wants. Like if I can get to where you set the time, the time just jumps around. Same thing on all the screens. Maybe I’ll try again tomorrow for hopefully better results.
customer_reviews.author: S. Attaway

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Easy to Set-Up, No Mess!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing already!! I just got mine and was able to set it up in just a couple minutes, there is absolutely NO mess because I’m not having to deal with soil and I can grow up to 9 different plants at once from my kitchen faster that I’d be able to outdoors?! Incredible. It also looks very sleek in my kitchen and it’s nice that this comes with 9 different herb pods to start out with! So excited to see them start to sprout, and am extremely happy with the purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Raina

customer_reviews.title: Nothing After 2 Months, Just stop working!!!
customer_reviews.text: 09/20/2020 (UPDATE) I bought my AeroGarden on July 16th 2020 and I paid $429.95, here it is September 20th and my AeroGarden is not working! No light, no water function, when I say nothing, I mean N.O.T.H.I.N.G.!!! For the amount of money I spent on this it should have given me at least 3 years of functioning, but 2 months! Give me a break! BUYERS BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady5487

customer_reviews.title: Grow fresh herbs in the house all year round!
customer_reviews.text: I love this because I have never been able to grow fresh herbs in the house. The AeroGarden is compact and very easy to set up. It requires very little maintenance and the control panel tells you exactly what to do and when to do it. Most of the herbs sprouted very quickly and I have been able to start cooking with them already There was one small issue. The chives and the the dill never sprouted. I have emailed customer service and I am sure this will be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanneep

customer_reviews.title: Great AeroGarden Basic 2019 model.
customer_reviews.text: This is for me, the best model. I purchased 2 on Amazon. The set up is super easy, and it a great looking unit. I love fresh herbs and they are very expensive to buy in the supermarket. It is great to be able to have them fresh in my own house. I am super happy with these 2 machines. They are already growing herbs and lettuce. Super fast delivery by Amazon. I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Get Everything
customer_reviews.text: I just planted my pods on Saturday, so I can't rate the product. I have room for 9 pods, but only planted 6 since I didn't receive all of the plastic caps that sit over the pods. I thought it would be as simple as Amazon contacting Aerogarden and having them sent to me. No. The solution is that I pack it all up and return it so they can send it again. It was very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: If You Cook, You Need This
customer_reviews.text: I never had fresh herbs readily available when I needed them. That's no longer a problem. Now all I need to do is turn around and grab what I need. The set up is easy, the display reminds me when I need to add food or water, and everything I planted grows. I am really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Groenendael

customer_reviews.title: Control Panel went out after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Bounty Basic in April. The control panel started going in and out after about a month. I unplugged it and plugged it back in. That fixed it for awhile but then it went out again and won’t come back. Kinda worthless without being able to see water levels and feeding time. Also 3 of the 9 pods that came with it never grew. Waste of money. I will say the basil looks good. Other than that, it’s a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jackson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY-you will be CHEATED - I was sold old, out of date and dead seeds
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Services LLC cheats you by selling you old, unusable and out f date merchandise. Once they have your money, they won't respond to you. The garden itself is OK, I guess...SOME of the other seed pods did germinate, a few plants are growing, but overall, being cheated really sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Staley

customer_reviews.title: Pods were moldy but the unit is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I love the unit. The pods arrived moldy. I would like for the company to send me some replacement pods... but having trouble getting a message to amazon or the company.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl genchi

customer_reviews.title: Quick growth!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little early for me to judge this thing accurately, but I just wanted to share how happy I am with how it’s starting out! I set mine up on Tuesday and planted salad greens and cherry tomatoes. Today is Saturday and I already have plant babies! My salad greens are already growing! Wow! I will update this as time passes and let you know how things progress.
customer_reviews.author: JK916

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bounty WiFi Alexa enabled!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my AeroGarden. Easy to set up and take care of. Been growing salad greens and heirloom tomato for 40 days (in AeroGarden) and I have harvested salad 4 times. So delicious. Tomato plant has tons of little flowers on it now. I plan on purchasing another one just like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Herbs are growing
customer_reviews.text: My son and his wife have severe food allergies. There are additives in most spices making them off limits for them. Sunflower oil and soy are the worst for them. When they received this they stopped opening gifts and immediately set it up. They are excited to have something so simple and are excited that they know what is in their herbs. They are constantly sending pictures of growing plants. I am surprised that it is controlled by new technology. This is the best buy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Love the functions, hate that you can't buy replacement lights.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I can grow what I want in my house and I cant grow a thing in my yard. I do not have a green thumb. But this really does the work for you. You will need to prune on your own but the rest is taken care of for you. I dont like that once the light goes out the whole thing is trash and im hoping the company eventually comes out with replacement lights. If the dont i will look for another company that does.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my aerogarden!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving my aerogarden bounty. I actually bought another aerogarden, the smaller 6 pod harvest model, just for my lettuce. Decided to use the bounty for larger plants, cherry tomatoes and bell peppers. 40 days in and my tomato plant is flowering nicely. Just planted my bell peppers a week ago after moving the lettuce to the smaller model. I will say though that you can't really crowd the aerogarden. I wouldn't have more than 4 large plant varieties in the bounty and 4 small plants in the harvest.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for myself, but really more for my 17-year-old who wanted to try his hand at it. It was very simple to set up and within a couple weeks we saw some seedlings. We ended up transferring the seedlings to pots, and they have become strong plants. We are currently growing from new seeds and can’t wait to see the results. Everything is self-explanatory and very easy to set up and maintain with this AeroGarden. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hajnalka Morse

customer_reviews.title: I'm really loving this! So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great little kitchen garden. The plants starting arriving just when they were suppose to. Of the 9 pods 7 are up with the remaining two not due to sprout as of yet. It's such a nice looking unit that it looks lovely in the kitchen and I hope for many good years using it. I plan to buy a 2nd one to have different salad crops ready for harvest at different times. Can hardly wait to see the eggplants in bloom.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love the aerogarden. So simple to set up and we had fresh herbs in a few weeks. The entire system is automated - it turns on/off by itself and you just have to fill up the water and add plant food when prompted (once every 2-3 weeks). The herbs are growing incredibly fast! I plan to buy another one in a few months and plant tomatoes for fresh tomatoes over the fall/winter. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Piechoski

customer_reviews.title: Garden me indoors
customer_reviews.text: The Aero Garden Bounty Basic Indoor Hydroponic Herb Garden is so much fun and It really really works. Thank you Aero Garden and Amazon. Enildo Molano 10/8/2020 San Francisco
customer_reviews.author: enildo molano

customer_reviews.title: The easiest hydroponic system
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of setup, as you'd think. But once you get it going, super simple to operate. We now have a nice crop of fresh herbs at hand for cooking all winter long. No noises or smells associated with this device, just some very bright lights. Something I noticed about hydroponic herbs, it seems like the flavors are not quite as intense as outdoor garden grown, but better than no herbs at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Way Over-Priced
customer_reviews.text: I love my Aerogardens. I have 3 now, bought before the price gouging started. The Aerogarden website has the best pricing. Why go anywhere else? The photos are: Lettuce mix (15days), herbs (18 days), and Kale (4 days).
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R. Mckeon

customer_reviews.title: Like steroids for your plants!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I purchased a smaller version last year and had so much success and fun with it that I opted to upgrade to this version. As a novice gardener this thing makes growing plants so easy. Plus I love that I have live plants in my kitchen. The kids live it too! Winter gardening starts now.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Excited
customer_reviews.text: Received this 8 days ago. Got started with the herb seeds and on day 5 had sprouts already. When the light is all the way up it wouldn't fit on my counter. I put it in my laundry room. Takes a little time getting use to the light being on for so long. Now i dont even have to look at the clock. Light goes out dogs go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fresh basil!
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a much older unit that I had with the flourescent lighting. I use this exclusively for basil. I'm hoping the LED's are long-lasting. Caprese salads are a frequent thing here. These even dress up a can of Chef Boyardee!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, Excellent Seller (Woot)
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with missing components (seed pods). Seller responded quickly and offered 3 excellent solutions. Received replacement pods in the mail (ordered separately) and they are finally growing. After an easy setup, my kids are excited to watch our plants grow. So far it's lived up to the promise of the high-quality brand name.
customer_reviews.author: BR Mama

customer_reviews.title: If your looking to spend this much, just buy a farm XL.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Amazon screwed up my order and didn't send the seed kits, when they were supposed to do a partial refund, didn't refund enough to cover all 9 seed kit they didn't send. But this is an amazing project for quarantine. I should have just bought a farm XL, would have saved some money and been able to plant more.
customer_reviews.author: Ceecee Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Clear and easy to follow directions with outstanding results!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Aerogardens for many years. The new Bounty is by far the easiest to put together, to program and to have control of my garden. The addition of WiFi is marvelous! Such a helpful tool! I am so excited to be using this garden!
customer_reviews.author: nancy crews

customer_reviews.title: Mobile App Nightmare for Wifi Setup
customer_reviews.text: I don't beleive the company can boast wifi connectivity with their mobile app having so much trouble. I have tried both IOS and android devices and am unable to create an account to use its features. I also beleive its send ur credentials in plane text as well. I am just so dissappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great product, if the manufacturer included the rods that support the trellis. I cannot find these rods to buy separately, and I don't want to go through the trouble of returning the entire kit hoping that the replacement product will have the rods. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It was very well packaged. There are not many instructions but it is so easy to use, so not needed. My only complaint is that the prepackaged seed pods were cut open in the back of the box and 3 little domes were missing. Hope they will still grow. I think I’m really going to like it.
customer_reviews.author: rittze

customer_reviews.title: It's a cool idea but not with the $$$
customer_reviews.text: As a garden it's great. But I paid extra for wifi connectivity, Alexa use and the app. Alexa and the app do not work which make the wifi capability obsolete. Can't log in on the app and can't add the device to alexa. Buy a less expensive model because the extra features just don't work.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grady

customer_reviews.title: I AM HAVING A GOOD TIME WITH THIS APPLIANCE.
customer_reviews.text: It's got many time saving features. I really like it. I am growing flowers in this one. My other one has heirloom cherry tomatoes, chives, and parsley in it. The tomato plants have been very productive. The parsley and chives, not great. They are probably feeling crowded by the flourishing tomato plants.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: My herbs are growing and look beautiful. I put 5 on the flavor as I am sure they will be great. They aren't fully grown yet. The system is very user friendly! I love that I can turn on a sound alert to tell me when to add water or plant food. The alert is customizable, mine is set to only make a sound as needed between 8 am and 8 pm. 100% of the pods sprouted!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 63 days see the results - Huge Basil leaves!
customer_reviews.text: UDATE: 63 days and see the results for yourself. Look at the size of my Basil leaves!!! The garden is super easy to setup. Filled the optional self-watering bottle once since I started. Just add food drops when it beeps. That’s it! Good luck and happy gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Prosperian

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to Harvest
customer_reviews.text: Very neat I bought This for my Mom for Christmas. We really are enjoying watching the plants grow. We planted 10 days ago so not to much to report however it was very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Dellorfano

customer_reviews.title: Love this year model!
customer_reviews.text: The Bounty Basic is one of the most innovative indoor gardens. With it’s easy to use setup screens I was able to get my basil, cilantro, and peppers growing right away. Being able to see the water levels and not just be told when to replace my water was also a nice touch to this years model. I can’t wait for to get some fresh herbs and vegetables this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Greg V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not everything sprouted.
customer_reviews.text: I really have enjoyed the product but my dill and Thai Basil did not sprout. Could you please replace these for me?
customer_reviews.author: shivels

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! So easy to set up, and I love having fresh herbs whenever I want them. This is only 5 pods planted out of 9!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this!
customer_reviews.text: In AZ it is hard to grow herbs and veggies. My wife is growing now like a pro. It is fun to have in the kitchen doing its thing (pushing water, turning the lights on and off. We had our first $300 salad last night, it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Olander

customer_reviews.title: Lamps stopped working, Aerogarden is not honoring their warranty
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months of usage the hood led lamp stop working, aerogarden is not shipping replacement parts due to the pandemic. I would not recommend this product due to the fact they are not honoring their own warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wigginton

customer_reviews.title: Pump stopped working after 1st week
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product, I really like it. Unfortunately, the pump stopped working after 1st week. When contacting Amazon customer service I was explained that I bought the open box item therefore it’s not under warranty. Going to return it and from now on will not buy an open box...
customer_reviews.author: DeanG

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Christmas, she set it up and is overjoyed! Sprouts within 2 weeks, and there's a solid Facebook presence for when she has any questions. She's talking about a 2nd one for tomatoes. Best gift and I had never heard of this before. If you are (or know) any basil enthusiasts this is for them!
customer_reviews.author: Cris F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the Aerogarden, and it worked as described. I was able to harvest 4 weeks after planting and I have harvested 3 more times since then. It is so awesome having fresh salad greens ALL the time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fiatoa

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: I've never attempted to grow much of anything. This was simple to put together and is very low maintenance. All of my pods grew, and grew really fast. Now I have fresh herbs for the picking. Looking forward to getting another for tomatoes and lettuce.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a cook!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the chef in your life! No mess because there is no soil used in this potting system. The device itself is easy to set up and produces good produce year long. Only thing is it could be a little larger so you don’t have to do as much pruning.
customer_reviews.author: McKinna

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Done
customer_reviews.text: easy set up. cost seems a bit high for an old man on SSI. the purchasing power of SSI goes down every year, because of inflation. patience helped by information on the screens. Finally all the sets sprouted and quickly grew. Have been harvesting but need to again, Great!
customer_reviews.author: AmosCB

customer_reviews.title: Not all pods grow
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 9 pod system and three of the herbs didn’t grow. The rest are growing like gangbusters.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great product - poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived with a damaged LCD screen (no problem with the shipping box). I bought the item from Amazon but now have it overseas. Customer service tells me because of that, there is nothing they are willing to do. I even offered to pay for a replacement part but that was rejected. Luckily I managed to pair the AeroGarden to the app so I can use it and am very much enjoying it. Just disappointing how poor the customer service experience is.
customer_reviews.author: B M

customer_reviews.title: Potential hazard from broken adapter
customer_reviews.text: Received the package and set this up instantly. The AC adapter that came with this has something broken inside of it (you can hear it when you shake it). The plug gets extremely hot and is a concern. I can't find a way to contact the seller without having to send the whole thing back because ther than this it's a nice setup.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Faust

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product until the pump broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's 16th birthday. She loved it and quickly and easily grew cherry tomatoes and peppers. When she tried to reuse it, we realized the roots of the plants had grown into the pump and damaged it, making it a one use product. She loved it while it worked, but it should be more durable for repeat uses.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Man do I have the veggies
customer_reviews.text: SO easy to use and plants sprouted in no time. Now I have cherry tomatoes and cucumbers as well as Basil all over the place, all in six weeks. It gives you info on what to do. Just water it.
customer_reviews.author: daniel balchen

customer_reviews.title: Love this way of growing things
customer_reviews.text: I bought this garden on Black Friday so the price was cut in half. It was my first and I absolutely love it. Assembly was quick and easy and have no complaints. Delivery was fast. Since then I have bought two 360 Harvest Elites. Highly recommend and enjoy the end what I grow.
customer_reviews.author: Lannie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift well received
customer_reviews.text: The aerogarden arrived promptly in great shape. The recipient of my gift loved it and easily set it up. After less than a week some of the herbs are beginning to sprout. Look forward to garden-fresh herbs for months.
customer_reviews.author: George Beddingfield

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Built
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this as someone who enjoyed their Aerogarden very much when it worked. Basil sprouted and did well until the issues occurred. The water level sensor does not function, it’s reading has been inaccurate. Likewise the pumps do not run. I’ve had this for less than a month and it’s only a paperweight at this point. Buyer beware, may not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Lucien Konan

customer_reviews.title: Easy and great way to enjoy an inside herb garden.
customer_reviews.text: This is a 9 pod system. 8 of the pods are growing very well. The dill did not sprout, but AeroGarden replaced it promptly. May add one of their other vegetable gardens as well.
customer_reviews.author: pmglover

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: Really neat and fun. Had one seed pod that didn’t produce. Everyone is taken with it. Haven’t eaten anything yet, just a few weeks in. BUT, be warned it is an expensive endeavor. Not just a one time deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K Hawn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I purchased this hydroponic garden. This is great for someone who doesn't have a green thumb, but wants to grow more herbs, flowers, vegetables, and fruits!
customer_reviews.author: T. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Very cool device
customer_reviews.text: Allows for the growing of fresh herbs on your counter top. The setup and care of this garden is simple. The picture attached to this review is 50 days from seed.
customer_reviews.author: Bueler99

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I planted 2 plants of tomatoes that sprout through the tomatoes I bought from Costco. 3.5 month later - so many tomatoes on the plant. You should see the results! Its amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karasik

customer_reviews.title: My little indoor garden..
customer_reviews.text: Fresh herbs during the winter!! The Aerogarden is easy to use. I wish the pods were further apart. I was slightly disappointed that I brought this a week before the price dropped (Black Friday deal).
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a brown thumb and I've been able to grow just about any seeded veggie/flowers/fruit that I've wanted to grow! Even if you just use it to start and transplant it, the plant still thrives. I'm so happy with this purchase that I'm going to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love watching my garden grow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It was so easy to assemble and watch my garden grow indoors is amazing! I love the digital display that tells me the water level and reminds me when to add plant food.
customer_reviews.author: Ressbccbe9

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little garden!!!! So easy to set up, easy to use and everything grows so fast!! I waited forever to get one and I finally got one!! It does not disappoint!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa S

customer_reviews.title: VERY bright light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I’m awful with gardening but wanted to have fresh herbs all year round. While this product is very simple to use and the odd germinate quite quickly, I can’t get past how bright the lights are. I have this in my kitchen on a counter and once my lettuce is ready for harvest, I’ll need to find a different room in my house to place this so that the light is not so disruptive.
customer_reviews.author: M Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I just unpacked it and found a couple of missing parts. First, no legs for the included trellis. Second, shorted me one clear plastic dome for the herbs. Nine herbs and eight domes. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Randal K Doerner

customer_reviews.title: AeroGarden bounty elite
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. All my herbs and my own seeds are growing. And i just purchase the farm plus model too. With another harvest. Beautiful plants and it looks Gorgeous too.
customer_reviews.author: Jannki Mithaiwala

customer_reviews.title: The system works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm poor on tech, so some of the settings (and the wifi) elude me, but this hydroponic garden really works! I've gotten results, some better than others, from all 9 pods. The basil (3 pods) is dominant in terms of prolific growth, followed by the chives. The mint (which in an outdoor garden is an aggressive plant) seems cowed by the other seedlings, and the thyme is rather timid, too.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn Block

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget. It's helped me to grow so many herbs really well, and it's so simple. Also, two months have passed since I bought it, and it's still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, and works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: A great buy, and works as advertised. The pre-seeded pods remove any guess work, and the device literally tells you when to add water or plant food. I saw my first sprouts seven days after setup. I intend to buy more products to use in my Aerogarden and I’d highly recommend this system to anyone looking to grow their own vegetables indoors
customer_reviews.author: tbump34

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gifts I’ve received!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my Aerogarden! It was gifted to me for Christmas, so I planted my pods immediately, and they’ve just taken off. I can’t go through the herbs fast enough (they grow like crazy!), so I’ve been gifting them to family members. I was worried the flavor wouldn’t be as strong when grown indoors, but the flavor is incredible. Much better than store-bought herbs. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Works OK but not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate this but since about one out of four or five pods don't grow, giving it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Picartist

customer_reviews.title: I have the 3 pod, 9 pod bounty and its time that I step my game up to the Aerogarden farm XL
customer_reviews.text: Great for any occasion any situation. They may just save the world during this pandemic. Keep making progress Aerogarden.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for a garden... it's too hot to garden in AZ!
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend who has one similar to this model... she loves hers and I love mine! The instructions were fool proof, and everything sprouted. I'm waiting for my first harvest. I read a few posts saying that the light didn't work... mine works just fine after a few weeks anyway. I'm thinking of buying a second Aerogarden!
customer_reviews.author: Mary T. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Aerogarden
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that this product was endorsed by Aerosmith. Sadly, that is apparently not the case. It still grows things.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Raridon

customer_reviews.title: Grow vegetables in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Aerogarden, I have the more expensive Bounty and a small one for herbs. They are easily assembled and ready to plant in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Marshmallo

customer_reviews.title: No seed pods included in package.
customer_reviews.text: Product comes without seed pods or plant food. Those need to be purchased separately, of course. Buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: anotherphotographer

customer_reviews.title: the Tyme and chives seeds  did not sprout ,.
customer_reviews.text: We have had no luck in trying to get replacements for the Thyme and Chives seed pods that did not sprout. As far as we can see, Amazon HELP line has no way to address this kind of problem
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Buy and herbs will grow
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, what I was looking for. As expected, and useful. Love having an indoor herb 🌿 garden
customer_reviews.author: Felicia M. Charles

customer_reviews.title: It is fun and delicious 😇😇
customer_reviews.text: Gifts for my daughters, both wonderful cooks. They love this😇😇
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is truly amazing, got it for my fiance for Christmas and she loves it! It literally is as simple as setting it up and leaving it, you just add for when prompted. It looks great too! The lights are bright, so I would recommend setting it up away from where you sleep, or adjust the light cycle accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Has only been a week but already have salad greens sprouting. Fyi: Need to place the unit somewhere in home that the bright light will not interfere with your activities. The initial growing has the light to stay on for 15 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Powers

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Growing vegetables is easy and they taste farm to table. I recommend this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Tdp

product_meta.title: AeroGarden Bounty Basic Indoor Hydroponic Herb Garden, Black
product_meta.description: Style:Bounty Basic (2019)THE ALL NEW BOUNTY BASIC - Perfect for a variety of BIG harvests (herbs, salads, tomatoes, peppers & more).Stay in complete control of your garden using the new high-resolution control panel and keep plants thriving while you're away with the new Vacation Mode feature.Up your garden game and join the Bounty family at an affordable price.
feature_bullets: THE ALL NEW BOUNTY BASIC - Perfect for a variety of BIG harvests (herbs, salads, tomatoes, peppers & more).Stay in complete control of your garden using the new high-resolution control panel and keep plants thriving while you're away with the new Vacation Mode feature.Up your garden game and join the Bounty family at an affordable price.
IN-HOME GARDEN SYSTEM - Home grown freshness & flavor right at your fingertips 365 days a year!Grow fresh herbs & veggies right on your kitchen countertop with this indoor herb garden.

NO SOIL, NO MESS - Plants grow in water with this hydroponic growing system.Grow up to 9 plants, up to 24" tall in your indoor garden.Just drop in the non-GMO, pre-seeded pods and watch them grow.Sprouts in days, harvests in weeks and lasts for months with a 100% germination guarantee.

THE WORLD'S LEADING COUNTERTOP GARDEN - Energy efficient 30 watt LED Grow Lights deliver the perfect spectrum for fast growth & big harvests.Smart garden technology automatically turns lights on & off and reminds you when to add water and liquid plant food.

INCLUDES EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO GROW - 9-Pod Gourmet Herb Seed Pod Kit with Genovese Basil (x2), Thai Basil, Curly Parsley, Italian Parsley, Thyme, Chives Dill, Mint and nurtured by our specially formulated Miracle-Gro liquid plant food, enough for a full season of growth. Also includes a 6 inch tall trellis. All natural & non-GMO.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars838 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
